      Tests obtaining a validation message when it can be found in an alternative resource group.

      Tests obtaining a validation message when alternative resource groups are involved, but the message is only found in the default group.

      Tests obtaining a validation messages that must be loaded from resources.

      Tests obtaining a validation message from resources when a blanc string was passed to the alternative resources.

      Tests whether a validation message obtained from resources caches its text on first access.

      Tests whether changing the default resource group affects resolving messages from resources.

      Tests obtaining a validation message from the resources that cannot be resolved.
      void testGetValidationMessageFromResourcesWithParams()
      Tests obtaining a validation message from resources when parameters are involved.

      Tests whether the message level is set to default if not specified otherwise.
      void testGetValidationMessageLevelProperty()
      Tests whether the validation level can be obtained from a property.
      void testGetValidationMessageLevelPropertyCaseInsensitive()
      Tests whether the property values for the level property are case insensitive.
      void testGetValidationMessageLevelPropertyInvalid()
      Tests whether an invalid level property is detected.
      void testGetValidationMessageLevelPropertyLiteral()
      Tests whether an enumeration literal can be used directly as value for the level property.

      Tests passing a null context to getValidationMessage().
      void testGetValidationMessageNullKey()

      Tests properties of a newly created handler.
